extension.name: ZView
extension.description: It allows to model a new widget model. The methods in this component can be applied in any widget.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZView model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetElevation
methods.description: Changes the elevation of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingLeft
methods.description: This method changes the left padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingTop
methods.description: This method changes the top padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingRight
methods.description: This method changes the right padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingBottom
methods.description: This method changes the bottom padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPadding
methods.description: This method changes the padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetEnabled
methods.description: This method sets the widget as enabled or disabled.

methods.name: SetVisible
methods.description: This method changes the visibility of the widget.

methods.name: SetClickable
methods.description: This method changes if the widget responds to click events.

methods.name: SetLongClickable
methods.description: This method changes if the widget responds to long click events.

methods.name: SetAlpha
methods.description: This method changes the opacity of the widget.

properties.name: Background
properties.description:
Specifies the background of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Elevation
properties.description:
Specifies the elevation of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>The widget displays a shadow according to its elevation.
>In order for the shadow to be displayed, the widget must have a non-transparent background.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description:
Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Padding
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description:
Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description:
Specifies the opacity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Range from 0.0 (0% visible) to 1.0 (100% visible)
